nodes.bodyText: This is not separate page if I understand correctly? Will it be more appropriate to have name like "RegisterInputErrors" or something like that?

nodes.bodyText:
I wonder whether we need this class at all. It combines fields from AccountFields and PasswordFields POs. Wouldn't it make more sense to place the webelements to the POs that they belong to?
Also, AccountFields is not used only for registration but profile updates as well, so at the very least the name of this class is IMHO a bit misleading. So maybe we should at least rename it.
